info.description: Get and process information about Utility Beneficiaries
info.title: Reference Utility Beneficiaries APIs

get.summary: Retrieves the utility beneficiaries details for a customerRetrieves the utility beneficiaries details for a customer

parameters.name: companyName
parameters.description: The company in which payment is processed

parameters.name: companyNameCT
parameters.description: The company in which payment is processed

parameters.name: beneficiaryId
parameters.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

parameters.name: beneficiaryAccountId
parameters.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

parameters.name: bankSortCode
parameters.description: The sort code or the national clearing code of the beneficiary bank.

parameters.name: transactionType
parameters.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

parameters.name: preferredPaymentProductId
parameters.description: Denotes the identifier associated with the payment product which is preferred by the customer

parameters.name: beneficiaryIBAN
parameters.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

companyName.description: The company in which payment is processed

categoryId.description: Unique identifier associated with the product name of the account or contract. For example: For customer/counterparty accounts, the identifier would be in the range 1000 to 9999. For ledger accounts, in the range 10000 to 19999.

beneficiaryAccountId.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

bankSortCode.description: The sort code or the national clearing code of the beneficiary bank.

preferredPaymentProductId.description: Refers to the ID associated with the payment product which is preferred by the customer.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System
